author: timbeiko
content:
Flagging a chance request for EIP-7702 by <@203220829473996800> https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/eip-7702-set-eoa-account-code/19923/326?u=timbeiko

It's on the agenda for ACD next week. It would be ideal if we could come to a resolution on this before the call üôÇ

author: lightclient
content: Yeah it seems pretty clear we need chain id to be uint256. I know people didn't want this originally because no one was aware of efforts requiring such large chain ids. But it seems pretty clear now there is actually quite a bit of support for moving towards them. I'm in favor üëç
